text:
July 28, 1959
Dr. Lyle W. Ashby
Deputy Executive Secretary
National Education Association
1201 Sixteenth Street, N. W.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Dr. Ashby:
X am taking the liberty of sending you a copy of our forthcoming NAEB
Network offering. I thought you might be interested in what the
nation's educational radio network is doing. I also thought you might
have particular interest in the programs listed cm pages 9, 10, 13, 14,
19, 20, 23, 39, 41, 44, 45, 52, and 53.
Sincerely,
hjsars
Harry J. Skomia
Executive Director
